intro.title: Summary:
intro.summary: Specialist in building interactive websites with emphasis on optimized designs and modern technologies.

about-me.title: About Me
about-me.summary: I am characterized by my dynamism, proactivity, and strong commitment to teamwork. I am a versatile person, capable of multitasking and making decisions with confidence.

experience.title: Professional Experience
experience.summary: I have worked on various projects ranging from website development to interactive applications, utilizing modern technologies to ensure an optimal user experience.
experience.list1: Layout and front-end web development using PHP, JavaScript, HTML, and CSS.
experience.list2: Adapting Figma/PSD designs into functional code.
experience.list3: Performance optimization and load speed enhancement.
experience.list4: Use of preprocessors like SASS and tools like Webpack/Gulp.

projects.title: Projects
projects.summary: Here you can see some of the projects I have worked on, showcasing my skills in web development and design.
